name: Five Night's At ElisStuff's
description:
ElisStuff's Pizza World Has Been Open Since 1948 And kids have enjoyed this place for generations!!! But the Company is losing reputation for many incidences over the years. And you are a security guard working the night shift. 12 am - 6 am can you make it through the week 150$ a Week!

CONTROLS: WASD move up down left right in main menu 

SPACE: camera
